summary.p: Could not come to Bullinger, as the bailiff was still gathering further information. Asks Bullinger for a sermon for the church consecration Sunday. Complains that he can no longer catch poultry. Was with the mayor of Bremgarten. New contracts are to be concluded with the farmers of Arni.

div.p: Greetings from Christ. Know, dear brother, that I could not come on Tuesday, because the bailiff was still gathering evidence, which has told me much more than I have done there. So it seems to me that it is not in my favor, etc.
Furthermore, God has delivered me from my need on Sunday.

Also, my request is, if you cannot preach for me - as it would be my greatest request and for the farmers, since it will be a great church consecration -, that you would write to me, as you have done before, for the church consecration «the reason for our faith from the ancient fathers to us», as I will do myself. Know that I can no longer catch chickens, geese, or birds; I am entirely in misfortune.
I was also with the mayor again on Wednesday; if they send the farmers from Arni and deliver other letters, it will be in our favor, as some properties have been sold from it.
Live and farewell. Greet the family.
